name: IDEAS ON
tagline: FinTech at Heart. Excellence in Mind.
description:
IDEAS ON provides bespoke software engineering services for finance industry, FinTech startups and scaleups. The company has been created at a junction of expertise in financial technology implementation and profound understanding of lean startup methodology. We mix the best from both worlds by keeping regulatory compliance, security and enterprise scalability with a need to get fast time-to-market, lean implementation and dynamic iterations. 
Our expertise includes fundamental pillars of product development for FinTech: banking-grade security with regulatory support & compliance. 
IDEAS ON is based in Poland with offices in Warsaw and Wroclaw. We provide nearshore IT outsourcing services and bespoke software services for financial industry.
Due to our profound understanding of startup & scaleup environment, we develop FinTech products with Lean Startup approach - implementing MVP (Minimum Viable Product) in a Week Blueprint.
Our expertise covers:
End-to-end crowdfunding solutions,
Payments (e-wallets, gateways, transaction fraud detection), 
Open APIs (PSD2, whitelabeling, web API),
Distributed Ledger Technology (smart contracts),
Microsoft solutions (PowerBI, MS Dynamics 365, Office 365, HD Insights, Azure),
Compliance (KYC, AML, PSD2, IFRS9, EIS/SEIS).
